base_description: The circuit structure includes 5 nodes and 5 interconnecting branches. The passive components include 4 resistive element(s). The circuit is powered by 1 current source(s). There are no controlled sources in this circuit. Measurement setup includes 1 voltage measurement(s). In total, this circuit comprises 5 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Adjust the current source 1 parameter from 82A to 246A.
Change the resistive element (labeled 1) from 88立 to 880立.
Modify the value of resistive element 2 from 67立 to 5立.
